mean_cn: n. 针叶树；松柏科植物
mean_en: any tree that produces hard dry fruit called cones. Most conifers are evergreen (= have leaves that stay on the tree all year).
sentence: Conifer trees have seed cones and needle-like leaves.
sentence_trans: 针叶树有锥形的种子和针形的叶子。
word_etyma: coni松果 ＋ fer带来，拿来 → 带来松果的树 → conifer针叶树
